name: The Last Bird (developerdjay)
description:
The Last Bird is a top-down endless high score game about a bird enacting revenge on the robots which exterminated their flock. 

This was made using Unity for the Mini Jam 99 in 72 hours. The theme was Birds with a limitation of Can't stop moving.

How To Play

  • Use your mouse cursor to control the direction of the bird
  • Use spacebar to drop explosive poop
  • The poopbar on the bottom right acts as both the ammo count as well as the health bar
